metadata.description: Vibe coding tools that turn new builders into confident AI-first practitioners. Built on the Work Loop methodology.

plugins.name: prd-manager
plugins.description: Complete PRD management suite. Generate, update, and compare PRDs throughout your build process.

plugins.name: work-loop-coach
plugins.description: Embeds the Work Loop methodology (Articulate → Build → Prompt → Execute → Evaluate → Iterate) into your building process.

plugins.name: agent-handles
plugins.description: Make your app AI-testable with semantic handles. Audit, suggest, and add agent-handle attributes for Playwright testing.

plugins.name: claude-pilot
plugins.description: Claude becomes your first user. Test your app with Playwright, walk through user flows, and get a real user's perspective.

plugins.name: build-checkpoint
plugins.description: Progressive validation gates that trigger testing at natural breakpoints. Quality checks before commits, pushes to main, and PRs.

plugins.name: screenshot-journal
plugins.description: Visual build history that captures your app's state at key moments. Build a timeline of progress with screenshots.

plugins.name: flow-questions
plugins.description: Hook-driven prompts that ask the right questions at the right moments. Guides thinking about validation and UX.
